game.title: The Enchanted Amulet
game.description: Solve the riddle of the ancient temple to retrieve the amulet in the center of Mount Everdeen.
game.reward: 7500 gold coins and a magical artifact

task.objective: Research at the local library for clues
task.description: Consult the ancient scrolls to gather information about the temple's location and riddle.
Be prepared for treacherous snow and ice. The entrance to the temple is at the summit's peak.

task.objective: Find and solve the riddle in the temple
task.description: The amulet's location will be revealed once you uncover its secrets. Beware of guardian creatures.
